price: 41. Diggah Qhuraan keenih yemeete waqdi kaal koroositeeh, yengcdde mari, wohul diggalsime-le. Diggah a-Qhuraan Yalli kaa yiysiiseeh, mayso-le kitab kinni.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِٱلذِّكۡرِ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَكِتَٰبٌ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū bil-dhik'ri lammā jāahum wa-innahu lakitābun ʿazīzun
